name: A Day At The Track
description:
You like horses? You like gambling? Well... You sure have to the right place because here we have both. Bet on which horse you think will win to earn some serious coin. Do you have enough luck to keep going? Good luck and have fun! This project was made in 10 days for MigJam #7 with a Theme of All Luck No Skill. In the downloadable version there is a setting to enable twitch chat to play along using simple commands.

Resources Used:

Unity Engine: https://www.unity.com/

Aseprite: https://www.aseprite.org/

Audience character pack from: http://opengameart.org/content/rpg-character-bases-assets

Sounds:

Starting horn: https://freesound.org/people/RDB/sounds/63753/

Nature Sounds: https://freesound.org/people/Vonora/sounds/269570/

Horses Running: https://freesound.org/people/sonically_sound/sounds/645465/

Crowd Cheering: https://freesound.org/people/Johanneskristjansson/sounds/371339/

Race Music: https://kbrecordzz.itch.io/ocarina-of-nice
